examples.chinese: 哪怕笨笨拙拙磕磕碰碰,只要你想做,你就一定能成功的
examples.translation: Even if you are clumsy and stumbling, as long as you want to do it, you will definitely succeed

examples.chinese: 这笨笨磕磕的,就根本来不及跟不上节奏
examples.translation: This clumsiness, can't keep up with the rhythm at all

examples.translation: This trip I clearly felt a decline in physical strength, and felt my limbs moving clumsily
